posts.post_title: FS: Sporty Postal Card New York Highlanders Team Postcard -- Hal Chase
posts.post_content:
Rare chance to own this Sporty Postal Card NY Highlanders PC with none graded higher and the other SGC 3 won't be up for sale until after I'm dead (I own that one too). Here's your chance, $3600 delivered, PPFF.  Email or PM if interested.
